text: World of Dance host Jenna Dewan Tatum flaunted her enviably taut abs in a rainbow'Los Angeles'bikini and cropped red hoodie for a sporty new spread shot by photographer Jeff Lipsky.'I work my literal a * * off for my a * *! That's the way it is. When you dance all the time, you're constantly using that muscle. When you stop dancing that much, that's the first thing that goes,'the 37 - year - old presenter said of her problem area in the March edition of Health.'Also, my stomach after baby is something I have to put a lot of extra effort into.
